column7: description
Actif
With a melee weapon, according to the crew member’s Force and Weapon Value
With a distance weapon, according to the crew member’s Dexterity and Weapon Value
The fighter defend themselves. The next attack only does half the damage.
Roll some dice. Succeed : Runaway, Fail : Nothing happens, Critical : Knock Out
Ends the member’s turn
With a Melee Weapon, the Brute knocks the target for 1 turn. Removed by "Help mate" skill.
With a Melee Weapon, the Brute does half its damage to each enemy member
The Brute waits for 1 turn, inflicting 3 times his normal damage
During 2 turns, The Brute gains full energy
The Doctor heals 30 damage to the target
The target gets 10 health points at the beginning of every turn, for 3 turns
The target loses 10 health points, for 3 turns
The Doctor heals 25 damage to each member of its crew
The target is protected. Its damage is halved for 2 turns. Removes Knocked out
The next 3 attacks are directed to the Cooks target
The target's damage are doubled for 3 turns
The Cook fills the crew’s energy points
The Cannoneer waits for 1 turn, inflicting 3 times his normal damage
The Cannoneer inflicts the third of its damage to 4 random targets
The Cannoneer’s does 30 damage to its next attacker
The Cannoneer does 20 damage to the entire enemy crew
The Crook throws a coin. Heads: Double Damage, Tails: Miss
With skillful fingers, The Crook steals some gold coins to its target
The Crook makes the target cry. Its damages are halved, and it cancels the Toated Effect
Roll some dice. Succeed : All the Crew runs away, Fail : Nothing happens
